Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Suite in G major, HWV 441

c. 1703–1706

[IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 19' 30"

  • 1. Allemande
  • 2. Allegro
  • 3. Courante
  • 4. Aria: Presto
  • 5. Menuetto
  • 6. Gavotta
  • 7. Gigue
  • This suite might be a compilation by William Babell, where movs. 1, 3, 5 and 7 are by Handel and movs. 2, 4 and 6 are by Babell.

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/5 · BA 4065 · Klavierwerke II / Suites de Pièces pour le Clavecin, Zweite Sammlung von 1733 · ed. Peter Northway / Terence Best
  • Associated Board · Selected Keyboard Works, Book 1 · ed. Richard Jones [movs. 1 and 4]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4221 · Klavierwerke II / Suites de Pièces pour le Clavecin, Zweite Sammlung von 1733 · ed. Peter Northway / Terence Best
  • Henle · HN 472 · Klaviersuiten und Klavierstücke (London 1733) · ed. Ellwood Derr
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50118a · Klavierwerke I, Teil a · ed. Peter Williams

1. Allemande

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 1.5

2. Allegro

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2

3. Courante

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

4. Aria: Presto

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

5. Menuetto

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

6. Gavotta

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

7. Gigue

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2
